targets.query: SELECT count("count") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT count("count") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter
SELECT        "count" FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter
SELECT           "on" FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT           "on", "driver" FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("lastLength") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=false) AND $timeFilter
SELECT min("lastLength") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=false) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "lastLength", "on" FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("lastLength") FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=true) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "lastLength", "on" FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "on"=false) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("count")     FROM "detectors" WHERE ("biu"::tag =~ /^$BIU$/ AND "detector"::tag =~ /^$DETECTOR$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "driver" = 2 AND "on" = true) AND $timeFilter
